slackBotSimple.command: if [ "{condition}" = "True" ]; then python3.8 scripts/actuators/slack_actuator.py --simple $(cat scripts/actuators/slackbot_token.txt) {channel} {message}; fi

slackBotBlocks.command: if [ "{condition}" = "True" ]; then python3.8 scripts/actuators/slack_actuator.py --blocks $(cat scripts/actuators/slackbot_token.txt) {channel} {message} {blocks}; fi
